page.title: 01General Account.
page.content: Our block lies in the north-west of{ { {Stevenage.A residential area}in the south-west is surrounded by{arable {farmland}.The{residential area consists of part of{Stevenage Old Town surrounded by{New Town blocks:Pin {Green,}built in 1964;{Martins Wood, built in 1968 and{St.Nicholas,}built in 1970.{Pin Green Industrial Estate contains offices, light industry and warehousing.The area contains{a water {tower and reservoir.}It has the former parish church of{St. Nicholas,}the {Ecumenical Church}at the Oval and{St. {Hugh's}at The Glebe.The{neighbourhood {shopping centres}are at{The Oval, The {Glebe}and{St.Nicholas}.The town cemetery lies off Grace Way and {Hampson Park,}a public play area,is in Lonsdale Road.Residents work in Stevenage,on the town factory sites, or commute to London.
